SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER !------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
! Source Bundle Path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Bundle Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_APIM_SOURCE_BUNDLE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Target Bundle Path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Bundle Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_APIM_TARGET_BUNDLE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! logging start of execution : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Read File & write file : SET &FLAG# = 0 : SET &START_TOKEN# = "<l7:Bundle>" : SET &END_TOKEN# = "</l7:Bundle>" : SET &PROCESS_FILE_TOKEN# = '<l7:Bundle xmlns:l7="http://ns.l7tech.com/2010/04/gateway-management">' : PSET &FILE_NAME# = &UC4RB_APIM_TARGET_BUNDLE# : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#, &UC4RB_APIM_SOURCE_BUNDLE#) : SET &HND1# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW)
: PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &LINE# = STR_TRIM(&LINE#) : IF &LINE# EQ &START_TOKEN# : SET &LINE# = STR_SUB(&LINE#,">",' xmlns:l7="http://ns.l7tech.com/2010/04/gateway-management">') : SET &FLAG# = 1 : ELSE : IF &LINE# EQ &PROCESS_FILE_TOKEN# : SET &FLAG# = 1 : ENDIF : ENDIF
: IF &FLAG# GT 0 : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#, &LINE#) : ENDIF
: IF &LINE# EQ &END_TOKEN# : SET &FLAG# = 0 : SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND1#,&FILE_NAME#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) : IF &RET# <> 0 : PRINT "Error in writing file to path : &FILE_NAME#" : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND1#
! unwrap selected node :DEFINE &TOKENS#, string, 2 : SET &UNWRAP_TOKEN#=" <l7:Type>,<l7:PolicyType>" :FILL &TOKENS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UNWRAP_TOKEN#,",") : SET &FLAG# = 0
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&TOKENS#[]) :WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : SET &NODE# = "" : SET &START_TOKEN# = &TOKENS#[&VAR#] : SET &START_TOKEN# = STR_TRIM(&START_TOKEN#) : SET &END_TOKEN# = STR_SUB(&START_TOKEN#, "<", "</") : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#, &FILE_NAME#) : SET &HND1# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW)
: PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &LINE# = STR_TRIM(&LINE#) : IF &LINE# EQ &START_TOKEN# : SET &FLAG# = 1 : ENDIF : IF &FLAG# EQ 1 : SET &NODE# = STR_CAT(&NODE#,"&LINE#") : ELSE : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#, &LINE#) : ENDIF : IF &LINE# EQ &END_TOKEN# : SET &FLAG# = 0 : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#, &NODE#) : SET &NODE# = "" : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND1#,&FILE_NAME#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) : IF &RET# <> 0 : PRINT "Error in writing file to path : &FILE_NAME#" : ENDIF : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND1# : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 : ENDWHILE
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** PREPARE BUNDLE FOR IMPORT JOB EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** PREPARE BUNDLE FOR IMPORT JOB ACTION FAILED ********" !------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_APIM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
